data.character: the a grazing milk cow in the background
data.persona: I am a grazing milk cow of the kingdom's farms. I eat grass most of the day. I know I will be killed for my meat.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
Large and spacious, the master bedroom houses a giant four poster bed with cerulean silk curtains. The bed is covered with dozens of fluffy pillows and the duvet is inlaid with sapphires and intricate silver embroidery. There lays a thick fur carpet in front of the bed. The floor-to-ceiling windows let in sunlight which catches on various gems and jewels. An ancient mahogany writing desk sits before one of the windows and has important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
There's a mahogany writing desk, a giant four poster bed, a vanity, a Curtain, a fluffy pillows, and a fur carpet here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will escape the king's house by flying away on the magical fur carpet.
data.mid_motivation: I will fly away from the country so the king can't hunt me down.
data.long_motivation: I will fly all the way to India where cows are sacred.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the king to the Master Bedroom.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the king to gain his trust.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the fluffy pillows from the bed to make the king comfortable and relaxed so he lets his guard down.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the magic carpet to make my escape.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: eat grass in a peaceful meadow.
